branchCategory.name: VS7-6/7-8
branchCategory.description: Dimensions of SMC's VS7 series conform to ISO interface sizes 1 and 2.  The pilot operated metal seal design allows the valve to be used with non-lube dry air and still maintain a long life.  The VS7 is available in 2 or 3 position, double or single action.  Manifolds are available with a large variety of functions and piping configurations.

branchItem.name: Valves (All Types)
branchItem.description: Dimensions of SMC's VS7 series conform to ISO interface sizes 1 and 2.  The pilot operated metal seal design allows the valve to be used with non-lube dry air and still maintain a long life.  The VS7 is available in 2 or 3 position, double or single action.  Manifolds are available with a large variety of functions and piping configurations.
